name: Kente Crush
description:
Plan your moves to restore the Kente-Filled Adinkras! Match Adinkras and win!

Welcome to Ghana where a special cloth called “Kente”, is an integral part of the culture! In this game you are given Adinkras (symbols) that need to be matched in order to progress throughout the game. As you match the Adinkras, the Kente fills up giving you a high score!

Make sure to meet your target as you compete for a high score without running out of moves! Play your way through challenging level designs and enjoy a unique culturally enriched experience.

Features:
* Over 100 levels with unique gameplay
* Progressively Challenging levels
* Unique artistic style
* Fun cultural experience of Ghana
* Daily Rewards
* Spin Wheel for prizes
* Connect with friends on Facebook
* Cool music

Get Matching on your phone today!

NOTE: Kente Crush is free to play however, there are some in-game content that can be purchased for real money.
